name: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate
summary:
Embark on a groundbreaking time travel adventure that has been completely reimagined for the next generation of VR. Experience history like never before as you travel back in time to rewrite the events of the past and reshape the future.

Wanderer - The Fragments of Fate is a remake of the award-winning and critically acclaimed VR time travel adventure game ""Wanderer"".
